name: Google Calendar / Highlight Calendar (Orange)
description: Can you find your schedule items on your calendar only by color? This style makes specific calendar underlined and changes shape to be recognized them very easily. Select color "Mango" for your favorite calendar and try it. for new look: - underline & solid corner for orange colored items for old look: Orange colored schedules are changed their shapes for each view: - "Day"/"Week"/"7Days" view : Rounded rectangle. - "Month" view : Underline for time specified schedule, Rounded rectangle for full-day schedule, - "Agenda" view : Underline for time specified schedule. # Only orange colored calendar is supported now.
